Please join us in Halas, Sunday evening, June 1st at 7pm Eastern as we say goodbye to our dear friend, Warmadz.
Also, feel free to send in any quotes or pictures of Warmadz that you would like to have included on this page.
Click on pictures for larger versions
To Warmadz (Scott) I will miss you my dear, thank you for all you gave me in laughs, tears, and in being my friend. One day we will meet again. You gave me the joy in playing Berina and I thank you for that

~ Berina
I'll remember the character and the man with adoration. War...Scott...wherever you are...when I get there, your ass is MINE! I love you.

~ Djuna
Warm (Scott) you will be truely missed. Good luck my friend and I hope that heaven has better internet connections than we do down here. God speed my friend.

~ Sindee
Godspeed, brother Scott and may you be in Heaven before the Devil knows you're gone.

~ Gil
